SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 3C 
VALID UNTIL 0255Z

FROM 40E CDS-40SSW SPS-50NW ABI-40WSW CDS-40E CDS 
AREA TS MOV FROM 23035KT. TOPS TO FL370.

FROM 30WSW MCI-40E IAH-30SSE DLF-70NW DLF-80SSE MRF-70NW 
MRF-40NNE TXO-30WSW MCI

WSUS32 KKCI 160055

FROM 40NW ABI-30S TTT-DLF-50SSE FST-40NW ABI 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 22030KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 160255-160655 
FROM 30WSW MCI-40E IAH-30SSE DLF-70NW DLF-80SSE MRF-70NW 
MRF-40NNE TXO-30WSW MCI 
REF WW 50. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
